name: just words
long_description:
Weâ€™re building an AI-first marketing tech stack for enterprises. We are on a mission to rethink growth by turning content into conversations. Our core product allows companies to auto-refresh content on growth channels like emails using reinforcement learning, artificial intelligence, and causal inferences. 

Companies have 10X their speed of experimentation, and have seen stat sig engagement lift with our technology. We built similar software on Twitter and Pinterest, which lifted user growth by 20%.
